gameframe

Interface Drawable


  • public interface Drawable
    A Drawable Interface. Functions as the View (MVC) of the Grid-Based Game Framework.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d, int w, int h)
      Draw the background elements of the board
      void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d, int w, int h, java.lang.String b)
      Draw the player and AI elements of the game
